name: Evil Way
description:
You awake in a strange place, a small room. You need to figure out how to get out...will you be able too?

Evil Way is a first person adventure game where the objective is to navigate a labirynth and find 3 keys to open the final door. You will have to overcome any challenge posed upon you!

Controls:

Arrow - Move

X - Toggle Flashlight

TAB  - See messages

Spacebar - Jump

Mouse - Look Around

Mouse Click - Interact

Daniel Vicente - Programming

Tainah Monteiro - 3D Art, UI design and implementation, Sound Design

Diego Barbosa - Game Design and 3D Art.
